name: Ring Invaders
description:
Gameplay

A strategically deep circular twist on the classic Space Invaders. Defeat endless waves of aliens before they close in. Collect various powerups and stay alive for as long as you can to get the highest score!

Patreon

If you want to show your support for the game, consider supporting me on my Patreon!

Twitter

You can also follow me on Twitter, where I post updates about games I am working on.
